text.div:
Varicella Zoster Antigen Test

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    21592-1 Varicella zoster virus Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    21594-7 Varicella zoster virus Ab [Titer] in Serum
    21595-4 Varicella zoster virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    21596-2 Varicella zoster virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    22601-9 Varicella zoster virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    22602-7 Varicella zoster virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum
    22605-0 Varicella zoster virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    22606-8 Varicella zoster virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum
    26723-7 Varicella zoster virus Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    33327-8 Varicella zoster virus Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Complement fixation
    44771-4 Varicella zoster virus Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
    5401-5 Varicella zoster virus Ab [Titer] in Serum by Complement fixation
    5402-3 Varicella zoster virus Ab [Titer] in Serum by Latex agglutination
    6569-8 Varicella zoster virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
    6570-6 Varicella zoster virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
